title: ParkingPatrol — Parking Violation Reporting Bot
header_p: Bot for reporting parking violations — fast, simple, legal.
qr_text: Scan QR code or click here
step1_desc: The bot greets you and reminds you how to take a photo with geolocation. Tap 'Report' to begin.
step2_desc: Attach a photo of the violating vehicle as a file — this extracts date, time, and location.
step3_desc: The bot shows a map from photo metadata. Confirm or enter address manually.
step4_desc: Submit anonymously or with contact info. Verified phone numbers are marked.
step5_desc: Choose: unpaid parking, sidewalk, lawn, etc. Bot routes to correct authority.
step6_desc: See full text, date, time, coordinates, and submitter details before sending.
step7_desc: Tap 'Send' — bot creates HTML email and PDF and forwards to the right service.
terms_short: By using the service, you confirm you have read the full text and accept it. In short: We are a mediator. Max 3 reports/day. No fakes.
